name: English Teacher for kids
description:
We are only considering native English speakers.

We need a native English speaker to work with a family with two children. The boy is 3 years old and the girl is 5 years old. Previously studied the language. Under the terms of the offer a salary of 300,000 thousand rubles, two weeks paid holiday twice a year. Also travel with the family Moscow/Crimea/Sochi. We cover all expenses, flights, accommodation, meals, taxi. Work schedule 5/5 days a week, 1/5 weekends a week.
